description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.comPierre-Yves Ricau - Android Engineer at Square

ABSTRACT
LeakCanary is an Open Source library from Square to automatically detect memory leaks in Android apps. That's cool, but then what? [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7710

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: LeakCanary, then what? Nuking Nasty Memory Leaks
